## Bio {#sec-bio}
## This is a short BIO about me.

title: Research
text:
PhD Research
The PhD project focuses on improving the Dutch labour market forecasts by assessing the reliability and exploring the potential of using additional data and applying different estimation techniques.


Projects

title: Roy Meijer
text:
Hi!
I am a PhD candidate at the Research Centre for Education and the Labour Market (ROA), Maastricht University.
